manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Description AnHome 7 in 1 Laptop cleaning Tools, the ultimate solution for keeping your electronic devices clean and pristine. This comprehensive cleaning kit is designed to tackle all the dirt, dust, and grime that accumulates on your phone, computer keyboard, laptop, earbuds, MacBook, and headphones. With our specially designed cleaning tools, you can say goodbye to smudges, fingerprints, and debris that hinder the performance and appearance of your devices. Let's delve into the features of each component in this versatile cleaning kit: Phone Cleaning Tool: This tool features soft bristles that effectively remove dust and dirt from your phone's screen and crevices. It ensures a crystal-clear display and a hygienic phone surface. Computer Keyboard Brush: The keyboard brush is perfect for tackling those hard-to-reach spaces between your keyboard keys. Its fine bristles gently sweep away crumbs, dust, and other particles, ensuring a clean and responsive typing experience. Keyboard Cleaner Kit: This kit includes a flexible cleaning gel that molds into all the nooks and crannies of your keyboard. It effectively lifts away dirt, hair, and debris, leaving your keyboard looking and feeling like new. Laptop Cleaning Kit: Specifically designed for laptops, this kit contains a microfiber cloth and cleaning solution. Safely wipe away smudges, stains, and fingerprints from your laptop screen and body, restoring its pristine appearance. Earbud Cleaning Kit: Keep your earbuds in top-notch condition with this kit. It includes a gentle brush and cleaning solution to remove dirt, wax, and debris, ensuring optimal sound quality and hygiene. MacBook Cleaner: Made for MacBooks, this cleaner is safe to use on your MacBook screen and body. It effectively eliminates smudges, fingerprints, and dirt, offering a clear and vibrant display. Headphone Cleaning Kit: Enhance your listening experience by keeping your headphones clean. This kit provides a brush and cleaning solution to remove dirt, dust, and bacteria from your headphones, ensuring optimal sound quality and comfort. The AnHome 7 in 1 Cleaning Tools is a must-have for anyone who wants to maintain the longevity and performance of their electronic devices. Each component is crafted with precision and durability, ensuring long-lasting use. With this comprehensive cleaning kit, you can enjoy a clean and hygienic digital experience.

Technical Specifications Size 4.8 x 1.7 x 1.1 inch Weight 0.19 lbs Brand AnHome Smart Home Features Phone Cleaning Tool, Computer Keyboard Brush, Laptop Cleaning Kit, Earbud Cleaning Kit, Headphone Cleaning Kit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: This is an item I didn't know we really needed, I don't know how we lived without it this long. Make cleaning easy as can be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This kit cleans hard to clean areas and seems to be sturdy and built to last many uses.
reviews.reviewText: This An Home Keyboard Cleaner Kit Cleaning Tool 7 in 1 is a decent kit at a decent price and will clean every aspect of your computer and mostly even better for laptops. The best part of this kit in my opinion is the brush that deep cleans all dust, dirt and whatever could get stuck between the keys. Use it gently though as it could rip the keys right off the board even though the brush is very soft. It comes with cleaning solution, a key remover and a fine cleaning instrument to get into crevices and places other kits may not reach as easily. The back has a felt that can be used to clean LCD screens and I think it would make a great addition to any laptop case for the quick cleanup if ever needed and the price is right for sure compared to other kits of the same quality. Its small, dependable and works...what more can you ask for in a cleaning kit for on the go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everyone with AirPods need this
reviews.reviewText: This has been a game-changer in maintaining the hygiene of my AirPods. The compact design and included tools make cleaning intricate areas a breeze. The gentle brushes effectively remove dust and debris without causing any damage, ensuring my audio experience remains top-notch. The inclusion of antimicrobial wipes adds an extra layer of cleanliness, making it a comprehensive solution for keeping my AirPods in pristine condition. This kit is a must-have for anyone looking to extend the life of their AirPods and elevate their listening experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what was advertised...:-(
reviews.reviewText: Not only does the product not fit in between keys on a key board, my spray bottle was glass and broke inside it's protective cover, and the multi-tool function is to big. Brush works. Very disappointed😞!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What a cool and handy little box to have. I like the tools and the way they work on different things. I put one back upside down and had trouble getting it back out. But when I got it out and flipped it over, it slid in and out a lot easier. The slide out brush is very nice. It wasn't easy to use the cleaning pad on the back of the case. The plastic hits the screen I was cleaning. It should be thicker to avoid that. I also cleaning my car dash radio with it. I'll bet there are lots of different things you can clean with this that we haven't thought of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for safely maintaining your electronics. I use it for my son's keyboard and my laptop screen mostly. Comes in very handy. The soft, flexible bristles effortlessly reach between keys, ensuring a thorough and gentle clean. I like that it is small, yet it holds everything I need in one place. Easy to store in my kitchen drawer. Essential companion for your electronics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to use it on my AirPods but the bit was a little too big

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very handy gadget
reviews.reviewText: I didn't like that the cleaning tool did not really come with directions. But, I went back to Amazon and watched a few videos on how to use it. It's nice to have something that will clean earbuds and it works well for that. I like that the tool kit come in a nice compact storage container (easy to carry in your purse if you want to).
